methods.description: Retrieves a list of competitions for a given class id.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: Your API Key available from your developer portal

parameters.name: classId
parameters.description: The class id to retrieve information for.

parameters.name: isPublished
parameters.description: Specify whether only active entities should be returned, according to the William Hill definition of active

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specify fields in addition to the default to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: displayed
parameters.description: Specify whether to return displayed entities or not

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Specify a channel filter and only results from that channel will be returned

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Specify a status to filter results by. This is currently A (active) or S (suspended)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The field to order the response by, followed by the order. For example: name,desc

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Skip over a number of elements by specifying a start value for the query

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the number of results to return

parameters.name: culture
parameters.description: Code used to return responses in language other than English, acceptable values are en-GB|de-DE|es-ES|fr-FR|nn-NO|fi-FI|ru-RU|pt-PT|hu-HU|sl-SL|ga-IE|en-CA|sr-Latn|sv-SE|el=GR|zh-CHS|it-IT|zh-CHT|cs-CZ|de-AT|ja-JP|pl-PL|da-DK|ro-RO|nl-NL|tr-TR

methods.description: Retrieves a list of events for a given class id.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: Your API Key available from your developer portal

parameters.name: classId
parameters.description: The class id to retrieve information for.

parameters.name: isPublished
parameters.description: Specify whether only active entities should be returned, according to the William Hill definition of active

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specify fields in addition to the default to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: displayed
parameters.description: Specify whether to return displayed entities or not

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Specify a channel filter and only results from that channel will be returned

parameters.name: settled
parameters.description: Specify wether only settled entities should be returned

parameters.name: includeEmpty
parameters.description: When declared as false it should exclude markets and events that have no selections / markets

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Specify a status to filter results by. This is currently A (active) or S (suspended)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The field to order the response by, followed by the order. For example: name,desc

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Skip over a number of elements by specifying a start value for the query

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the number of results to return

parameters.name: headlineSummary
parameters.description: Return only headline markets (Markets with the lowest display order) Either 1 InPlay and 1 Pre-Match, or the amount specified in marketCount, if available. Markets and Outcomes will be returned.

parameters.name: includeAllDescendants
parameters.description: Include every descendant in the below heirarchy

parameters.name: isInPlay
parameters.description: Show only events that are in-play

parameters.name: marketCount
parameters.description: Specify the number of markets to return when requesting headlineSummary. This count of InPlay and Pre-Match markets will be returned.For example, when specifying 1, 1 In Play and 1 Pre Match market will be returned.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Return only events for the specified date (yyyy-MM-dd).

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.description: The UTC datetime from the events to be returned. (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss)

parameters.name: dateTo
parameters.description: The UTC datetime TO the events to be returned. (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss)

parameters.name: eventSort
parameters.description: Filter event by event sort

parameters.name: culture
parameters.description: Code used to return responses in language other than English, acceptable values are en-GB|de-DE|es-ES|fr-FR|nn-NO|fi-FI|ru-RU|pt-PT|hu-HU|sl-SL|ga-IE|en-CA|sr-Latn|sv-SE|el=GR|zh-CHS|it-IT|zh-CHT|cs-CZ|de-AT|ja-JP|pl-PL|da-DK|ro-RO|nl-NL|tr-TR

parameters.name: marketPublished
parameters.description: Specify whether only active entities should be returned, according to the William Hill definition of active

parameters.name: marketStatus
parameters.description: Specify a status to filter results by. This is currently A (active) or S (suspended)

parameters.name: marketDisplayed
parameters.description: Specify whether to return displayed entities or not

parameters.name: marketChannel
parameters.description: Specify a channel filter and only results from that channel will be returned

parameters.name: marketSort
parameters.description: Filter by market sort (e.g. MR (match result) -- (Outright)).

parameters.name: marketEw
parameters.description: Specify whether to return markets with each way betting or those without

parameters.name: selectionStatus
parameters.description: Specify a status to filter results by. This is currently A (active) or S (suspended)

parameters.name: selectionChannel
parameters.description: Specify a channel filter and only results from that channel will be returned

parameters.name: selectionPublished
parameters.description: Specify whether only active entities should be returned, according to the William Hill definition of active

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: Your API Key available from your developer portal

parameters.name: competitionId
parameters.description: The competition id to retrieve information for.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specify fields in addition to the default to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: culture
parameters.description: Code used to return responses in language other than English, acceptable values are en-GB|de-DE|es-ES|fr-FR|nn-NO|fi-FI|ru-RU|pt-PT|hu-HU|sl-SL|ga-IE|en-CA|sr-Latn|sv-SE|el=GR|zh-CHS|it-IT|zh-CHT|cs-CZ|de-AT|ja-JP|pl-PL|da-DK|ro-RO|nl-NL|tr-TR

methods.description: Retrieves a weighted list of Selections.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: Your API Key available from your developer portal

parameters.name: sportIds
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of sportsIds for which to retrieve topBets for

parameters.name: competitionIds
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of competitionIds for which to retrieve topBets for

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the number of results to return

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specify fields in addition to the default to return (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma-Separated List)

parameters.name: paramTopBetEventId
parameters.description: The event ID to retrieve top bet information for. Multiple events up to 5 may be used

parameters.name: sortName
parameters.description: The market sort code used to further filter event results. Please note this can only be used with event id(s).

parameters.name: culture
parameters.description: Code used to return responses in language other than English, acceptable values are en-GB|de-DE|es-ES|fr-FR|nn-NO|fi-FI|ru-RU|pt-PT|hu-HU|sl-SL|ga-IE|en-CA|sr-Latn|sv-SE|el=GR|zh-CHS|it-IT|zh-CHT|cs-CZ|de-AT|ja-JP|pl-PL|da-DK|ro-RO|nl-NL|tr-TR

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Code used to select a set of top bets settings, default is "whapi" which allows events set in far future to be included, setting the value to "en-GB" will activate english sportsbook settings, mirroring top bets on the website, which restricts events returned to those taking place in next 36 hours. Acceptable values (not all heve their own settings - if none currently available for that locale - en-GB will be used) are de-DE|whapi|en-GB|es-ES|fr-FR|nn-NO|fi-FI|ru-RU|pt-PT|hu-HU|sl-SL|ga-IE|en-CA|sr-Latn|sv-SE|el=GR|zh-CHS|it-IT|zh-CHT|cs-CZ|de-AT|ja-JP|pl-PL|da-DK|ro-RO|nl-NL|tr-TR

apiDescription: The William Hill SportsData REST API is a collection of GET methods to provide William Hill product data such as sport, competition, event, market and selection data (including prices).
